sub_title: Digital Strategist & Consultant • Operating from zone genius | Digital Transformation | Growth Hacking - Meaningful Travel Ambassador • Operating from zone passion | Sustainability  | Personal Development
summary:
Welcome to my profile!

My name is Dana Morad and my mission is to support businesses put their messages out creatively, concisely, and accurately on digital marketing platforms. I make sure that all of the communications are achieving the goals and KPIs planned. In addition, I keep customers at the core of all messages via regular social listening and customer data analysis.

Volunteering: I have volunteered for NGOs concerned with youth development and green peace since 2004. In addition, I was titled Meaningful Travel Ambassador by the International Volunteering HQ for 2018. I raised awareness about the importance of traveling for a cause by volunteering in remote areas of Madagascar, Africa.

Self Development: I regularly run self-checks to keep my system (body and mind) awake and kind. I am currently studying nonviolent communication and aiming to build more bridges with like-minded people around the globe.

treasury_media.title: Nonviolent Communication Certificate
treasury_media.description:
Invested in a life changing language technique to end disagreements. The NVC method is designed to increase empathy and improve the quality of life of those who utilize its tools and the people around them.

www.theupway.coach

treasury_media.title: Amazon - Sponsored Ads Foundations Certification
treasury_media.description: The Sponsored ads Certification validates my proficiency in Amazon’s sponsored ads, like Sponsored Products and Sponsored Brands, with emphasis on retail readiness, sponsored ads strategy, and campaign optimization. This Certification is best suited for advertisers or agency professionals who leverage Amazon Advertising sponsored ads through the advertising console or Seller Central.

treasury_media.title: Amazon - Retail for Advertisers Certification
treasury_media.description: The Amazon retail for advertisers Certification validates my proficiency in Amazon retail programs as they relate to advertising strategy. Topics include differentiating among types of selling partners, navigating the basics of Seller Central and Vendor Central, optimizing product detail pages for retail readiness, and planning with retail insights and analytic tools.

treasury_media.title: IVHQ - Volunteering Certificate
treasury_media.description:
Awarded a volunteering certificate in recognition of my contribution to sustainable development, cultural exchange, and personal growth.
Named IVHQ Internal Volunteering Ambasador 2018.

treasury_media.title: Facebook - Sight, Sound and Motion
treasury_media.description: With more video viewing than ever before, Facebook provides an opportunity to reach the people who matter to you through their Facebook News Feed. This course will show you how sight, sound, and motion can drive awareness of your brand.

treasury_media.title: Facebook - Brand Measurement Solutions
treasury_media.description: New approach to measurement—an approach focused on people rather than cookies and clicks.

treasury_media.title: Instagram 101
treasury_media.description: Businesses are successfully building communities on Instagram through beautiful, visual experiences. Learn the best creative practices for brands on Instagram and when to use image or video ads to deliver messages to an engaged community.

projects.title: Travel Blogging
projects.description:
- Build a travel blog to document trips and inspire travel lovers.
- Generate, edit, and publish occasional blogs to increase website traffic and daily content on social media platforms to maintain and improve engagement rates.
- Shoot and edit photos and videos from bi-weekly travel plans.
- Collaborate with other bloggers and photographers on different projects.

profile_positions.description:
Client(s): Johnson and Johnson| Selfcare & Oralcare 

Working together with the J3 team at UM as a Digital Strategist & Consultant. Responsible for applying, improving, and re-innovating digital strategies to produce new business capabilities. Work closely with the Jhonson and Jhonson teams to define the methodology used to create new competitive advantages across different online and offline platforms.
profile_positions.title: Media Consultant & Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Client(s): Friesland Campina, Kitopi Brands, Anghami, Wide Out Agency, Generation C Agency, ...

Alongside media experts, contractors and freelancers, we launched an online digital agency that provides SEMs with the support they need to reach their planned KPIs. I am currently the brand manager for all our clients and am directly responsible for all Digital Media Strategies.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & Digital Strategist

profile_positions.description:
Product: Flora Plant

I believe in a greener tomorrow and found similar values with a new and upcoming Upfield brand called Flora Plant. As a Media Growth Hacker, I was in charge of the global media presence for the brand. With digital transformation in mind, I was responsible for growing a community of 35k+ active and engaged members and drive a correlation between media and sales to convert a engaged users/  followers into consumers. My role also extends to give guidance and support to local teams with their launches and campaign execution.
profile_positions.title: Global Digital Growth Hacker

profile_positions.description: Alongside media experts, I launched an online digital agency that provides SEMs with the support they need to reach their planned KPIs. I am currently the brand manager for all our clients and directly responsible for all Social Media planning and executions.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Media Lead

profile_positions.description:
Brand: Tajawal & AlMosafer

As a travel enthusiast, I had a great experience building the social media department for Tajawal,  an online travel platform, from ground zero. I was in charge of establishing the strategy, SM organic KPIs, and executing media campaigns. I actively hired a team of 5 community managers responsible for creating SM content, engaging with a community of over 100K followers, and providing 24/7 support for customers. Furthermore, I had regular one-on-one with the performance team within the Seera group to share learnings and pass on best-performing knowledge based on organic data. The efficient approach to the workspace allowed data sharing within departments, and our social listening reports helped improve our Ecom products and identify system glitches timely.
profile_positions.title: Senior Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Client(s): Unilever, Universal Biscuits

I built social media strategies for nine different clients and was responsible for creating social content, launching media campaigns, and increasing page engagement and followership. My daily projects also included reaching out to bloggers and influencers, monitoring online trends, and incorporating them into our campaigns in an agile manner.

*Top Clients:
Unilever brands: LUX Arabia / OMO Arabia / Comfort Arabia
United Biscuits: Digestive Middle East
profile_positions.title: Social Media Manager

profile_positions.description:
Client(s): Americana Group, KFC, Hardee´s, Digital Media Forums, Masdar Sustainable City

I worked closely with brand managers and clients on creating digital marketing strategies. I was in charge of executing creative content, launching SM campaigns, and successfully managing a community of over 5M followers on Facebook and Twitter.

* Top Clients:
KFC Arabia 
Etisalat
profile_positions.title: Media Executive and Planner

profile_positions.description:
Client(s): ABC Group, Fadel Group

I grew the digital communities through the use of social networking capabilities. I also delivered corporate communication material for the client's social media platforms in creative copywriting and was responsible for creating, amending, revising, and redeveloping canned responses to improve community management.
profile_positions.title: Community Manager / Copywriter

volunteer_experiences.description: With the use of personal social platforms, I spread awareness of the positive impact of meaningful travel and its potential to change lives. For example, I took part in a  sustainable development project in Madagascar to help build a school on a remote island near Nosy Komba and joined beach clean-ups with locals to educate them about the impact of plastic and batteries on the environment, the sea life, and more.

I provided consultancy to five startup entrepreneurs in auditing their social media channels in practical & measurable ways to build their communication with existing and potential clients.
I also gave them the tools and necessary guidance to start their brand's digital strategies to have more significant and impactful results.
My contribution was focused on helping Lebanese youth integrate into Arab affairs via an innovative educational program that engages diplomatic skills, leadership skills, and conflict resolution.
I completed preparatory sessions and workshops on training techniques to improve the outlook of Lebanese students towards diversity and encourage creative thinking towards conflict resolution.

I mentored younger schoolmates in developing solid friendships and fighting school bullying in the first year. Later on, we focused on tackling environmental challenges with hands-on community involvement that led to improving self-confidence.
